casebody.data:
MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002-0585. Klein v. Leis.

Hamilton App. Nos. C-020012, C-020013, C-020015 and C-020021, 146 Ohio App.3d 519, 2002-Ohio-1634. On motion for admission pro hae vice of Robert Dowlet and Stefan Tahmassebi by Walter J. Vogel and motion for admission pro hac vice of James H. Warner by Walter J. Vogel. Motions granted.
